item.title: The Trump Justice Department Is Right to Investigate Columbia’s Antisemitic Campus Agitation
item.description: Videos show that ‘protesters’ have used violence in their open support of an enemy — Hamas.

item.title: Maine’s Shocking Assault on Democracy and Free Speech
item.description: Stripping a legislator of the power to vote over her opinions is outrageous.

item.title: Leave ‘Affluenza’ to the Left
item.description: And stop sugarcoating economic malaise as the cure America needs.

item.title: Green Dreams Made Europe Vulnerable to a Mega Blackout
item.description: In Spain and Portugal, the rushed rollout of renewables and an overreliance on solar and wind energy clearly weakened these nations’ electric grids.

item.title: Exit Waltz
item.description: The hawkish former Republican congressman was a good, stabilizing voice, but there was no escaping the Signal chat embarrassment.
